item.description:
Topic: Our Limitations within Boundlessness. What are the limits of human understanding? This discussion explores the inconceivable reality that exist behind our human experience. Sources include: Zen master Dogen, Goethe and Isaac Newton to help illustrate the true meaning of shinjin, which Dr. Haneda calls "...the most important human experience taught in Shin Buddhism. A reading titled The Tip of the Iceberg from the book Dharma Breeze written by the famous Shin teacher Nobuo Haneda.

See our CALENDAR OF TOPICS and BUDDHIST COURSES & WORKSHOPS. See our main web site:
